name: Dæmon
description:
Dæmon

This prototype is a vertical slice of the game Dæmon.

Dæmon is a detective action-adventure, which explores systemic gameplay through dynamic context-aware character emotions. Everyone on earth has a Daemon. Daemons are an extension of one's soul.  Daemons are intrinsically linked to the thoughts, feelings and emotions of their human companions. Some people possess such powerful emotions that their Daemon unlocks super abilities that their owners can use. However, not all people use these abilities for good. In this game, you play a detective who is liberating their home city that has been overrun by local criminal gangs.
